column4: Which program is it that is supposed to be better than vmware ?
guest or host? and where are you getting the error?
I installed windows xp on my virtualbox ... But when I install the drivers to my video card it says that it can't find any hardware that fits ...
why are you trying to install video card drivers?
VirtualBox presents a virtual video card to the guest that CANNOT do any 3D
if thats what you are planning to do, forget it
i guess you'll have to dual-boot then
I don't like windows that was the reason why I put it on a virtualbox ...
unfortunately, the Microsoft way has led us into this situation, and
what error did you get in Wine anyway?
